lore: After expirmenting with what can be done with a basic redstone engine, you discover a way to burn furnace fuels to produce actually a decent amount of power at a rate of 1MJ/t.
no_lore: The Stirling engine is a more powerful engine which uses furnace fuels to generate MJ. It produces a steady amount of power of 1 MJ/t.
note: As with all engines, it requires a redstone signal to run.
